content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I executed "execute_python_file" on "average.py" and received the result, "The average of the numbers is: 3.0". I read the contents of "productive_things_to_do.txt" and appended "This is a new log entry." to "file_logger.txt". I replaced the first occurrence of "This is a new log entry." with "This is a modified log entry." in "file_logger.txt". I listed the files in the current directory again and received a list of files.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_python_file", "args": {"filename": "average.py"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command execute_python_file returned: The average of the numbers is: 3.0\n', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "productive_things_to_do.txt"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command read_file returned: The website I found provides a list of over 100 productive things to do when bored, emphasizing the importance of rest and relaxation, and encouraging readers to try new things and improve themselves. It also includes an article on overcoming the planning fallacy and a personal account of following Benjamin Franklin's daily schedule, as well as promoting a free time tracking software called Clockify.", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "append_to_file", "args": {"filename": "file_logger.txt", "text": "This is a new log entry."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "replace_in_file", "args": {"filename": "file_logger.txt", "old_text": "This is a new log entry.", "new_text": "This is a modified log entry.", "occurrence_index": "0"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "list_files", "args": {"directory": "."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_python_file", "args": {"filename": "average.py"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command execute_python_file returned: The average of the numbers is: 3.0\n', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "productive_things_to_do.txt"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command read_file returned: The website I found provides a list of over 100 productive things to do when bored, emphasizing the importance of rest and relaxation, and encouraging readers to try new things and improve themselves. It also includes an article on overcoming the planning fallacy and a personal account of following Benjamin Franklin's daily schedule, as well as promoting a free time tracking software called Clockify.", type='action_result')]
"""
